[@microsoft/fast-element](../fast-element/index.html) &gt; [HostController](../fast-element.hostcontroller/index.html)

## HostController interface

Controls the lifecycle and context of behaviors and styles associated with a component host.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface HostController<TSource = any> extends ExpressionController<TSource> 
```
**Extends:** [ExpressionController](../fast-element.expressioncontroller/)<!-- -->&lt;TSource&gt;

</th><th>

[isConnected](../fast-element.hostcontroller.isconnected/)


</td><td>

`readonly`


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

Indicates whether the host is connected or not.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[mainStyles](../fast-element.hostcontroller.mainstyles/)


</td><td>


</td><td>

[ElementStyles](../fast-element.elementstyles/) \| null


</td><td>

The main set of styles used for the component, independent of any behavior-specific styles.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

## Methods

<table><thead><tr><th>

Method


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[addBehavior(behavior)](../fast-element.hostcontroller.addbehavior/)


</td><td>

Adds the behavior to the component.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[addStyles(styles)](../fast-element.hostcontroller.addstyles/)


</td><td>

Adds styles to this element. Providing an HTMLStyleElement will attach the element instance to the shadowRoot.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[removeBehavior(behavior, force)](../fast-element.hostcontroller.removebehavior/)


</td><td>

Removes the behavior from the component.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[removeStyles(styles)](../fast-element.hostcontroller.removestyles/)


</td><td>

Removes styles from this element. Providing an HTMLStyleElement will detach the element instance from the shadowRoot.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
